KishCore framework is a lightweight ActionScript 3 framework built for modularity and easy implementation. With full use of declarative programming and mxml, KishCore takes on none of the weight of the full Flex framework. This application is a minimalistic example usage of KishCore and is primarily to provide a starting point for developers wishing to build an app with KishCore.
